hevs.gdx2d.lib.interfaces

Interface KeyboardInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Benchmarker, GdxGraphicsTest, PortableApplication

    public interface KeyboardInterface
    An interface to interact with the application using a keyboard.
    Use Input.Keys to read the key code.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onKeyDown(int keycode)
      Invoked when a key is typed.
      void onKeyUp(int keycode)
      Invoked when a key is released.

    • Method Detail

      • onKeyDown

        void onKeyDown(int keycode)
        Invoked when a key is typed. Use Input.Keys to read the key code.
        Parameters:
        keycode - the code key, see Input.Keys

      • onKeyUp

        void onKeyUp(int keycode)
        Invoked when a key is released. Use Input.Keys to read the key code.
        Parameters:
        keycode - the code key, see Input.Keys
